item.title: Moving on
item.description: Most days that start with a run are good days. A 10 mile run gives just me enough endorphins to get me through the day and just enough fatigue to calm any anxiety, the world feels light and everything makes sense. Irrespective of how unpleasant the runs feels, I’m generally a pleasant person to be around afterwards. For the past few years I’ve trusted myself to be pleasant, not so much lately.
